personas.name: Executives
personas.guidance: Define the organization's risk tolerance, align strategy with business objectives, and oversee governance and compliance for AI systems.

personas.name: CISO/SSO
personas.guidance: Implement and oversee security strategies specific to AI, including threat modeling, risk assessments, and integration of AI-specific controls.

personas.name: Service Architects
personas.guidance: Design secure AI service architectures, ensuring that the AI system's design aligns with operational security and scalability requirements.

personas.name: IT Architects
personas.guidance: Ensure that AI and IT infrastructures are securely integrated by establishing secure data pipelines and safe deployment practices.

personas.name: Security Architects
personas.guidance: Identify vulnerabilities specific to AI systems, integrate robust security controls, and develop threat detection mechanisms tailored to AI risks.

personas.name: IT Operations
personas.guidance: Manage day-to-day operations, ensuring the secure functioning and continuous monitoring of AI systems.

personas.name: SOC Operations
personas.guidance: Monitor for AI-related threats in real time, respond to incidents, and integrate AI-specific threat intelligence into SOC operations.

personas.name: Service Operations
personas.guidance: Oversee AI service deployments and operational compliance while supporting both pre-deployment testing and post-deployment monitoring.

personas.name: Auditors/Policy Makers
personas.guidance: Develop policies and standards for secure AI adoption, perform audits, and ensure compliance with regulatory and ethical standards.

personas.name: Researchers/Data Scientists
personas.guidance: Focus on developing robust, adversarially resilient AI models, conducting research on vulnerabilities, and improving AI explainability and fairness.

personas.name: Users/Practitioners
personas.guidance: Adhere to AI usage policies, report suspicious behaviors, and provide feedback to improve the continuous evolution of AI systems.

personas.name: MLOps/DevOps Engineers
personas.guidance: Integrate secure deployment practices and continuous monitoring into the AI lifecycle, ensuring operational security throughout.
